title: 如何修改失落之城战利品箱子里的物品？
author: mc苦手233
txt_content:
RT，我大概浏览了下配置文件，里面只有大楼里刷不刷新箱子的选项，并没有刷新什么物品的选项

求大佬解答，另外我想刷新的是其他模组[维克的现代战争]里的物品,

replies.author: 青芦叶
replies.txt_content:
调整箱子里战利品的mod：

Customized Dungeon Loot (easiest imo, but less control/detail).

Addtional Loot Tables (still pretty easy, more work, more loot tables, more control/detail).

LootTweaker (personally never used it, but it does seem to take the cake as far as control/detail goes, but do I understand any of it, nope).

然而我也没搞清楚怎么用。。不过我看到很多国外整合包大佬在用。

replies.author: mc苦手233
replies.txt_content:
青芦叶 发表于 2020-3-25 21:12
调整箱子里战利品的mod：

Customized Dungeon Loot (easiest imo, but less control/detail).
好像都要修改战利品表
